description.full: Destiny is an epic first-person action shooter that delivers a thrilling combination of cooperative and competitive modes with in-depth character customization, including a huge variety of weapons, armor, and abilities.   This free demo experience represents a small sample of the activities you’ll find in the full game. The demo includes co-operative activities, story missions, and access to the games central social space, the Tower.   6 GB hard drive storage (or its equivalent) is required. Additional storage may be required for some updates and features. Storage requirements subject to change. There may be mandatory in-game updates which users must download to continue playing. Various elements and functionality of Xbox One & Xbox 360 Destiny Game requires Xbox Live Gold membership, sold separately. Please see www.destinythegame.com for further details. Terms and conditions apply.    Using the software constitutes acceptance of the Destiny Software License Agreement available at http://support.activision.com/license and the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy available at http://www.bungie.net/eula.
